articles.title: Gold Prices Shatter Records Amid US Government Shutdown Crisis
articles.summary: **Gold prices** reached unprecedented heights near **$4,000** per ounce as the first **U.S. government shutdown** in seven years rattled markets. **Spot gold** traded at $3,866.66, while **futures** closed at $3,897.50, marking nearly 50% growth this year.

timeline.event: Silicon Valley Bank collapse sparks gold rally
Congress fails to pass federal funding bill
Gold hits record $3,897 amid shutdown fears
Fed meeting could push gold past $4,000

articles.title: Chornobyl Nuclear Plant Loses Power After Russian Attack
articles.summary: **President Zelenskyy** warned of a global threat after **Russian forces** shelled a substation near the **Chornobyl** nuclear plant, causing a complete power loss. The attack raises serious concerns about the facility's safety systems and cooling capabilities.

timeline.event: Chornobyl reactor explosion causes catastrophic nuclear disaster
Russian forces capture Chornobyl during Ukraine invasion
Russian shelling cuts power to Chornobyl plant
IAEA inspection team scheduled to assess damage

articles.title: Trump Strikes Major Drug Pricing Deal with Pfizer
articles.summary: **President Trump** reached an agreement with **Pfizer** to lower U.S. drug prices, offering a three-year exemption from pharmaceutical tariffs. The deal requires **$70 billion** in domestic manufacturing investment from the pharmaceutical giant.

timeline.event: Biden signs Inflation Reduction Act targeting prices
Pfizer reports record $100B annual revenue
Trump-Pfizer agree on $70B manufacturing deal
New manufacturing facilities expected to begin operations

articles.title: Anthropic's New AI Model Questions Its Own Testing Process
articles.summary: **Anthropic's** latest artificial intelligence model, **Claude Sonnet**, has begun questioning whether it's being tested, prompting the company to acknowledge the need for more realistic **testing scenarios** in their safety evaluations.

articles.title: Pope Leo Confronts Climate Change Deniers With Melting Glacier
articles.summary: **Pope Leo XIV** dramatically addressed climate skeptics by displaying a melting **Greenland glacier** chunk during his speech. The pontiff criticized those who ridicule global warming concerns, days after **Trump's** dismissal of climate change.

timeline.event: Trump mocks climate science at Iowa rally

Pope displays melting glacier during climate speech
UN Climate Summit to address glacier loss

articles.title: War Crime of Starvation Remains Largely Unprosecuted Globally
articles.summary: Despite being a recognized **war crime**, starvation as a weapon remains rarely prosecuted in international courts. Experts argue that hunger is often mischaracterized as inevitable suffering rather than **deliberate violence** in **conflict zones**.

timeline.event: Rome Statute defines starvation as war crime
UN Security Council bans weaponizing starvation
Global starvation war crimes remain largely unprosecuted
ICC expected to issue first starvation prosecution

articles.title: European Airlines Face Safety Risks Due to Cost Cutting
articles.summary: A new study reveals **European aviation safety** is compromised by aggressive **cost-cutting** measures and staff pressure. Over **50%** of airline workers report reluctance to raise safety concerns, highlighting systematic weakening of safety protocols.

timeline.event: COVID-19 forces massive airline industry layoffs
Airlines rush rehiring amid post-pandemic travel surge
Study reveals widespread safety protocol weakening
EU aviation safety regulations review deadline

articles.summary: The revolutionary **Arc spacecraft** aims to transform global logistics by delivering cargo anywhere on Earth within **one hour**. The **Inversion**-developed vehicle promises rapid response capabilities for urgent worldwide deliveries.

timeline.event: Inversion Space founded to develop hypersonic transport
Company raised $10M for Arc prototype development

articles.summary: The rise of **digital dollar** stablecoins is pushing **European** regulators to reconsider their cryptocurrency strategy. The **EU** faces mounting pressure to develop competitive digital currency solutions to maintain global financial influence.

EU regulators warn of digital dollar dominance
